import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import { GLOBALTYPES } from "../../redux/actions/globalTypes"; const Step2 = () => { const planChoices = [ { type: "Mobile", price: "70,000 ₫", quanlity: "Good", resolution: "480p", devices: [
Phone
,
Tablet
, ], }, { type: "Basic", price: "180,000 ₫", quanlity: "Good", resolution: "480p", devices: [

,

Phone

,
TV
, ], }, ]; const history = useHistory(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { alert } = useSelector((state) => state); const handleStep2 = () => { const res = planChoices.filter((c, index) => index === choice)[0]; const err = {}; if (!res) { err.plan = "You haven't choose a plan yet."; dispatch({ type: GLOBALTYPES.ALERT, payload: { plan: err.plan } }); } else { dispatch({ type: GLOBALTYPES.STEPTWO, payload: { type: res.type, price: res.price }, }); history.push("/submit/step3"); } }; const [choice, setChoice] = useState(-1); return (
